articles.content: The coronavirus pandemic has already caused the shutdown of theaters in the West End and on Broadway. This has affected productions of Frozen, Hangmen and Who's Afraid of Virginia Woolf?, which will not return when restrictions are lifted. Shakespeare's Globe… [+834 chars]

articles.content:

articles.content:
